tweet: Today was the first ever Ada payment system introduced in Japan, at @tamukenchaaaaa’s BBQ 🍗 restaurant “Tamura”. Made possible by @emurgo_io! And of course I also paid for my dinner with $Ada. It was super fast and easy! My personal “Bitcoin 🍕” moment. @IOHK_Charles #cardano  https://t.co/B2ROCwJHsC
And here's the testnet episode on the Cardano Effect  https://t.co/zkA92ksZB5

Our social media post about a restaurant in Japan accepting Ada got over 4000 retweets so I had to go see it for myself on opening night. It was amazing to see every person pulling out @YoroiWallet on their phone and paying in Ada! Cardano community very much alive in Japan!  https://t.co/fMsDMjlh9h
The camera's were rolling as the Cardano ADA payment was made in Japan! 👀👍
Next one supporting $ada payments is a hotel in Okinawa...could this be the very beginning of nationwide Ada adoption in Japan? 👀😎 #Cardano #ada @emurgo_io @toshi_miyatake @IOHK_Charles

Today we rolled out a new feature - from now on you can purchase ADA directly from AdaLite wallet. You can use a credit card to purchase with USD or you can purchase with BTC or 242 other coins. This service is provided in cooperation with CoinSwitch. #ADA #Cardano @coinswitch  https://t.co/r4lcQZrTAn
